EmailTemplate.subject: Fleet One Fuel Card Application - Received - Need Address Verification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name},
Thank you for applying for our Fleet One Edge Fuel Card Program!
We have received your application, but we need to verify your business address.
Please provide a copy of a utility bill, bank statement, lease agreement, or your liability insurance with the below address present for verification. It is important that the name of your business ("{!Account.Name}") be listed with the address on this document.
The address on the document your provide must match:
{!Contact.MailingAddress}
Please send a copy of your verifying document (a picture taken with your phone is ok) back to me directly at your earliest convenience by Email (khaywood@fleetone.com) or Fax at (615) 850-0799 or Text (615) 246-7476.
Thanks!
